# 📉💰 **Bitcoin Price Drop Alert Workflow**

This automated workflow checks the current Bitcoin price and **sends an email alert if it drops by 5% or more** compared to the last recorded value. It’s split into 3 easy-to-understand sections:

---

## 🔎 **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**

1. **⚡ Manual Trigger**
2. **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **🧱 Extract Price**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **⚡ Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **🌐 Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

* **🧱 Extract Price**
  Extracts the **exact price value** from the scraped HTML using selectors (like CSS paths).

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

You can track the **real-time price** of Bitcoin straight from any public site, even those not offering official APIs. It's like building your own live feed.

---

## 📊 **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

🧩 **Nodes:**
4\. **🔄 Convert Type**
5\. **📗 Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**
6\. **📉 Find Drop Percentage**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **🔄 Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **📗 Get Last Recorded Price**
  Pulls the **previous Bitcoin price** from a Google Sheet (a record from last check). Acts like your “memory”.

* **📉 Find Drop Percentage**
  Calculates how much the price has dropped:

  $$
  \text{Drop (\%)} = \frac{\text{Previous Price - Current Price}}{\text{Previous Price}} \times 100
  $$

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

You’re comparing real-time data with past values automatically—no spreadsheets or calculators needed! This makes it ideal for **traders or enthusiasts** watching for price alerts.

---

## 🚨 **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ≥ 5%**

🧩 **Nodes:**
7\. **🔀 If droppercentage >= 5**
8\. **📧 Send Alert Email**
9\. **➡️ No Alert Needed**

### 🧠 What Happens:

* **🔀 If Statement**
  Checks: Has the price dropped by **5% or more**?

* **📧 Send Alert Email** (if true)
  Automatically sends an email to notify you about the drop. This could go to your inbox, or a team.

* **➡️ No Alert Needed** (if false)
  The workflow ends quietly without doing anything else.

### 💡 Why It’s Useful:

It **only alerts you when it matters**, saving your attention for big changes. You don’t need to monitor prices all day.

---

## 🎁 **Final Benefits:**

✅ **No coding required**
✅ **Real-time price check**
✅ **Smart alerts based on thresholds**
✅ **Great for traders, analysts, or crypto fans**
✅ **Fully extendable** – you could log alerts, update the sheet, send Slack/Telegram messages, etc.

---

## 🌈 BONUS IDEA:

Want it to run automatically? Add a **🕒 Cron Trigger** to check every 10 mins, 1 hour, or even daily!
